name: @lexicon/core-wasm
description: High-performance WebAssembly core for Lexicon editor

scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
scripts.test: npm run asbuild && PATH=/home/nixos/.nix-profile/bin:$PATH node tests/index.js
scripts.test:rope: npm run asbuild:debug && PATH=/home/nixos/.nix-profile/bin:$PATH node tests/rope.test.js
scripts.test:minimal: npm run asbuild:debug && PATH=/home/nixos/.nix-profile/bin:$PATH node tests/minimal.test.js
scripts.dev: PATH=/home/nixos/.nix-profile/bin:$PATH npm install && npm run asbuild:debug && npm run test
scripts.dev:rope: PATH=/home/nixos/.nix-profile/bin:$PATH npm install && npm run test:rope
